channel.title: Comments on: The History of SQL Server Integration Services
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Joel
item.dc:creator: Joel
item.description: Excellent overview - I agree completely on your point. Understanding the product history is a key factor when evaluating the technology as a whole and most importantly when selecting a version to implement. Most people want a quick answer to the question but it really does require some due diligence.
item.content:encoded: Excellent overview – I agree completely on your point. Understanding the product history is a key factor when evaluating the technology as a whole and most importantly when selecting a version to implement. Most people want a quick answer to the question but it really does require some due diligence.
